text: Gifhorn is a Landkreis (district) in Germany in the state of Lower Saxony. It has about 175.000 inhabitants. Gifhorn is located in the north of Braunschweig. == Towns and sub-administrations == In the district of Gifhorn there are 41 local communities.(numbers of inhabitants from the 30th June, 2005).
